message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?

I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I get a fair price for the product. How about we meet in the middle at $175? It's a great value for what you'll be getting.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $150?
I understand you're really close to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $155? It's still a great deal, and I think you'll be happy with the product.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm really trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $145?

I understand you're really stretching your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I get a decent price for the product. How about we meet at $152? It's a bit of a stretch, but I think it's a fair compromise.
I understand you're trying to get a decent price, but I'm really close to my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $120 and $152. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $136?

I understand you're really close to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I get a decent price for the product. How about we meet at $140? It's a bit of a stretch, but I think it's a fair compromise.
